assignments.title: Reading Trends
assignments.subject: English
assignments.instructions_md:
Self-contained prompt (no attachment needed). You have a chart of books read per month.
- Which month had the most reading?
- Which month had the least?
- Describe one pattern you notice across the months.
- Suggest one action to improve next month.

assignments.title: Soil Moisture Gradient
assignments.subject: Science
assignments.instructions_md:
You measured soil moisture from river bank to hilltop. Use the attached field notes.
- Sketch a simple gradient diagram from wettest to driest.
- Explain why moisture changes across the gradient (2 sentences).
- Name one living thing that prefers each end of the gradient.
